title: Meet Clara Emond: The Canadian who took Annemiek van Vleuten’s advice to race
content:
The 26-year-old only started racing in 2021 after initially picking up triathlon while studying law at university.

Read the full article at Meet Clara Emond: The Canadian who took Annemiek van Vleuten’s advice to race on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
